name: Clarifai
description: Clarifai offers a leading full-stack platform for the entire AI lifecycle. They specialize in unstructured data, including images, video, text, and audio, enabling developers and businesses to build and deploy AI-powered applications.

name: Hugging Face
description: Hugging Face is an AI company and community building the future of machine learning. Headquartered in New York, they provide open-source tools and platforms, including the popular Transformers library, for building, training, and deploying state-of-the-art ML models.
